whiteList.title: White list
whiteList.description: Only the devices in the list will be exposed. If the list is empty, all the devices will be exposed.

blackList.title: Black list
blackList.description: The devices in the list will not be exposed. If the list is empty, no devices will be excluded.

debug.title: Debug
debug.description: Enable debug mode for the plugin. Only for debugging purposes, not recommended for production use.

unregisterOnShutdown.title: Unregister
unregisterOnShutdown.description: Unregister all devices on shutdown. Only for debugging purposes, not recommended for production use.
